article_title: What do High Schoolers think of Obamacare?
article_text: Four high school students, (Jeron Dastrup, Kat Sears, Donald Rapier, and Kaylen Herring,) are in-studio along with Bob Chrismer of Performance Trust to preview this weekend’s tournament. It is the 4th Annual Performance Trust Debate Tournament, and the topic is the Affordable Care Act.
